uol.watchitgotit.engine

Class FileToQrEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uol.watchitgotit.engine.FileToQrEncoder

  • public final class FileToQrEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class does the work of decoding the user's request and extracting all the data to be encoded in a barcode.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CHAR_ENCODING
      The character encoding used for the textual part of the bytes encoded in the QR, that is, the header formed by the HEADER_FILE_PREFIX prefix, followed by the filename of the encoded file (truncated to FILENAME_MAX_CHARACTERS characters), followed by the HEADER_BODY_SEPARATOR that separates the header from the body.

      • CHAR_ENCODING

        public static final java.lang.String CHAR_ENCODING
        The character encoding used for the textual part of the bytes encoded in the QR, that is, the header formed by the HEADER_FILE_PREFIX prefix, followed by the filename of the encoded file (truncated to FILENAME_MAX_CHARACTERS characters), followed by the HEADER_BODY_SEPARATOR that separates the header from the body. The body, that is, the bytes of the encoded file compressed with gzip, are saved directly as bytes in the QR.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
